oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Major Samuel W. Pickens Portrait
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Giers & Co. National Portrait Gallery
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Major Samuel W. Pickens, who was the first commander of "A" company of the 3rd Tennessee Cavalry Regiment, who also commanded 150 men that were captured by General Forest in September 1863 during the Civil War.
